meanings.definition: The lowest throw of dice, a two.
meanings.sent1: In the game, rolling an ambsace means you get a two.
meanings.sent2: He was disappointed when he got an ambsace in the dice game.
meanings.sent3: When she rolled an ambsace, everyone laughed at her bad luck.
meanings.sent4: Getting an ambsace felt like hitting rock bottom in the game.
meanings.sent5: The ambsace on the dice seemed to mock his chances of winning.

meanings.sent1: Having an ambsace in cards is not ideal for winning.
meanings.sent2: She groaned as she saw her ambsace in the card game.
meanings.sent3: His ambsace in cards made him the joke of the table.
meanings.sent4: The ambsace in his hand felt like a curse during the game.
meanings.sent5: The ambsace in the cards sealed his fate for that round.
